meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jeff Xie Alan Koolik Cooper Lair Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6894.

td.p: Jeff Xie, a junior from Edison, New Jersey
Alan Koolik, a junior from Boca Raton, Florida
Cooper Lair, a sophomore from Little Rock, Arkansas

tr.td: JOURNALISM
DESCRIBING THE RECENT MOVIE
YOU WISH YOU'D READ THE SCARLET LETTER
STATE'S LEFTS
(Alex: We're dealing with geography here. We want you to give us the state immediately to the left of the state we will tell you about.)
SWEET CHARITY
INSIDE INFORMATION
(Alex: Each correct response will be a word that can be formed from some of the letters in the word "information.")

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'First Amendment

Triple Stumper
')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(James Risen of The New York Times delivers the clue.) Though it\'s gotten me a couple of subpoenas, my protection of my anonymous sources stems from my faith in this constitutional amendment')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Alan, you wrote down your response very quickly, and you were smiling all the while because you wrote down [*]. That\'s the novel by John Green, and it is the correct response. Have you read it?)
(Alan: Yes, I have.)
(Alex: Good for you.)
CooperWhat is ?
$5,400
JeffWhat is The Secret Life of Bees??
$2,000
AlanWhat is The Fault in Our Stars?
$5,800
The Fault in Our Stars')
